title: Anandak-kaNNIr
sahitya:
Anandak-kaNNIr vArAdO en attA anbar pittA unnai cittam kuLira cintai sheidAl


anupallavi

  jnAak-kanalil urugip-pozhiyum gAnarasattaip-parugit-tudittAl


caraNam    tEnaLAvum shOlaik-kuyilgaL shiva mangaLam pADa �dhIm taka� vena dishai kulungat-
tillai mayilgaL ADa vAnilAvai maruvit-tavazhum mazhalait-tenral pOlE
mOnamAna dhyAna sukhattil nAnum nIyum kUDik-kuzhaindAl
